channel.title: Qualifications on Dr. Evan Freedman | Board Certified Forensic Psychologist
channel.description: Recent content in Qualifications on Dr. Evan Freedman | Board Certified Forensic Psychologist

item.title: Board Certification
item.description: Dr. Freedman was Board Certified in Forensic Psychology by the American Board of Professional Psychology (ABPP) in 2014. He is among approximately 300 Board Certified Forensic Psychologists in the United States who have been certified by ABPP.

item.title: Professional Affiliations
item.description: Dr. Freedman maintains active memberships with the following professional organizations.
